TopicTitle: What do you name your space agencies?

Articles.Content:
Kerbal Ãƒâ€žronautic and Space Establishment

= KÃƒâ€žSE (german for cheese)

Alan Aerospace Recycling and Packaging.

All our aerospace parts are recycled, and the assembly building doubles as a cardboard box factory.

The elements of the heraldic thingy of some supposed long ago ancestor of mine. A cockatrice, which fits perfectly with the mish-mash nature of the company, and two sable chevrons on an argent field.

The Kerbal Committee of Aerospace Programs - K-CAP

Founded after the Kerbals decided that pointing nukes at each other did nobody any good and deep down, they realized that all they ever wanted to do was space.

And so space they did.

A committee comprising representatives from all over Kerbin, with no solid hierarchy or any leaders. They just get bundled into a meeting room and decide where they want to send their GooÃ¢â€žÂ¢ next.

All in the best interests of Kerbalkind.

I totally did not modify a stock flag in paint to make this.

InterKerbmos, as we travel to space for all of kerbalkind in the name of science, adventure and socialism!

Plus the awesome mission patches... especially the patches... well, just for the patches and ribbons...

UKSPA

United Kerbin Space Probe Agency.

(Old Star Trek The Original Series reference)

Renamed mine to the...

National Astronautics Adminstration

My current save is Kerbalkosmos, and I finally made a custom flag. It's based on Interkosmos, USSR's and Russia's programme for sending allied nations' crafts to space that put my country's only cosmonaut to orbit.

My pre-.22 sandbox save was called the Praxis, after the mega-cooperate in the Red Mars trilogy.

My current save is Kerbalkosmos, and I finally made a custom flag. It's based on Interkosmos, USSR's and Russia's programme for sending allied nations' crafts to space that put my country's only cosmonaut to orbit.

My pre-.22 sandbox save was called the Praxis, after the mega-cooperate in the Red Mars trilogy.

Nice to meet a fellow Komrade! I named my own almost the same.

Mine is the Pan-Kerbin Space Program (Motto: "To the stars through big explosions.") The agency itself is the Pan-Kerbin Space Agency, and the central facility is the Kerbal Space Center (yeah, not very original, but it works).

Which reminds me, I've got to get a writeup about the Yrucrem and OSL programs finished... And to make a flag...
Which one? My one that I record YouTube videos in is SteevyTable since that is my YouTube name. Otherwise I have "Experiments" and then my main one for myself is just called SteevyT.

Vanilla - TSSA - TheSuperintendnt Space Agency

Modded - SuperTech LLC (was going to be Industries but I didn't like the acronym)

Edited October 21, 2013 by TheSuperintendnt
Fixed flags
Turkington Space Service, same as I use for most gamey RP stuff I do

Barbarians United, nick name is Barbarian.

seemed logical at the time.
Kerbal Kake Kompany

Kromey Kaerospace.

Because I'm Kromey (been that for a lot longer than there's been KSP, so it's just a coincidence that my name starts with a 'K' and kerbals add a 'K' to the beginning of keverything), and because kerbals would obviously name a company "Kaerospace" rather than "Aerospace" (see aforementioned "add a 'K' to the beginning of keverything").

Only just came up with that for 0.22, though, been struggling since 0.17 or so to figure out a name for my space agency.
Solar Space Agency
KASF Kerbal Aeronautics Space Federation

I never care about the name so i keep "default"

Also, isn't this a necropost since there were no posts from june to yesterday?

Edited October 22, 2013 by waffelzman
Mine is SKSE (Skaltan System Enterprises) and its subdivision ERI (Eskalento Rocketeer Indsutries, R&D of my New Rockets)
My current career save uses "Mediocre Orbits" but I started with "Lackluster Science and Spaceflight" several months ago. Self-esteem is an issue in our meetings.
See my flag in my signature block below.

Field Dynamics, Research and Development. Made it back when RP was a thing as a corporation, but i still like to run it under that guise. We're a multinational private enterprise probing the depths of space, pushing the envelope of space engineering and science as we go, and pushing envelopes is Jeb's specialty.

It's actually quite an immersive element to assign a good name and background to your space program. I've created other legends in my Kerbals, planted legacies on distant moons, and created quite an experience out of developing my own 'company'; it's certainly worth it to get creative with your naming and stick to an immersive title. If i had to give advice, i'd say you ought to find a 'buzzword,' something that is exciting. Coin a parallel term, and use it as your name.

For example, if i was into gyros (the food, i mean, i simply picked something random), i'd be going for a greek style. I might try the Olympus Space program or the Hellenic Space program. My own space program name came out of a mixture of preexisting private space agencies such as SpaceX or Bigelow. Any category can have cool titles if you brainstorm enough.
Jeb's Trucking Co!

Oseralis Space Industries, otherwise known as OSI. Picked the name due to a mythological creature in one of my books I wrote when I was younger. A sort of giant eagle. Still haven't made a proper flag yet.

Atlas Private Aerospace Corporation

"Carrying the world on our shoulders."

*not to be confused with Atlas Private Military Corporation
